name: Electric Energy Experiment - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
1.
go to the place where the materials such as magnet, stopper, and light-emitting diode are set.
pick up a magnet and put it in a plastic tube
Close the stopper of the plastic tube with the anameled wire.
shake the plastic tube and observe that the light-emitting diode lights up

<Result
Understands that shaking the hand generator causes the light-emitting diode to light up
Understands that the light comes on because the magnetic field inside the coil changes, causing induced current to flow
Understand...
